featured.text: Dancers used small reed hoops as symbolic representations of animals such as eagles or snakes.
Hseu Fang-yi, a young Taiwanese dancer, recently _____ at Lincoln Center in New York and won a great deal of praise.
The ballet dancers’ __________ movements delighted all the audience.

definition.zh_def: 舞者；從事舞蹈表演的人。
definition.en_def: A person who performs dances, especially as a profession.
definition.example: The dancer captivated the audience with her graceful movements.
